titleStmt.title: The unlavvfulnesse and danger of limited episcopacie· VVhereunto is subioyned a short reply to the modest advertiser and calme examinator of that treatise. As also the question of episcopacie discussed from Scripture and fathers. / By Robert Bailly pastor of Killwunning in Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Baillie, Robert, 1599-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Vnderhill, at the Bible in Woodstreet,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Morley, George. A modest advertisement concerning the present controversie about church-government.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
